headline: APA Corporation (APA): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on APA Corporation on Penny on the Dollar’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on APA. APA Corporation’s share was trading at $26.92 as of February 12th. APA’s trailing and forward P/E were 6.44 and 9.75 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. APA Corporation (APA) is a diversified oil and gas producer operating across the Permian Basin, Egypt, the North Sea, and offshore Suriname, with a market cap of […]

headline: What APA (APA)'s Earnings Beat and Cost Cuts Mean for Shareholders
summary: In late February 2026, APA Corporation reported its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with quarterly revenue of US$1,978 million, net income of US$279 million, and full-year net income of US$1.43 billion on revenue of US$9.22 billion, alongside updated production metrics across oil, gas and NGLs. The company coupled this earnings beat with ahead-of-plan cost savings of US$350 million on a run-rate basis, reinforcing its plan to trim 2026 upstream capital while still targeting...

headline: APA Target Raised by Roth Capital as Firm Maintains Neutral View
summary: APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) is included among the 14 Value Stocks to Buy with High Dividend Yields. On February 26, Roth Capital analyst Leo Mariani raised the firm’s price recommendation on APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) to $27 from $23. The analyst maintained a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm said it updated its model following the […]
